question: 保護する
sourceMnemonic: To <kanji>preserve</kanji> and <kanji>defend</kanji> something is <vocabulary>to conserve</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>to protect</vocabulary>. I won't let you destroy this land I'm trying <vocabulary>to protect</vocabulary>!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
